attributes.additional_details: For many years Preston has been looked down on but no more shall we receive this treatment. All prestonians will unite and receive the respect it deserves.
attributes.background: Make the legendary city with a proud Lancastrian heritage the capital of England.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government to take a specific action, and it's not clear exactly what you want the Government to do.

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to move central Government departments and the UK Parliament, which is what normally determines which city is regarded as a country's capital, to Preston, if that is what you want to happen.
